# branch fold fails if the branch needs to be restacked first.

as 'Test <test@example.com>'
at '2024-03-30T14:59:32Z'

cd repo
git init
git commit --allow-empty -m 'Initial commit'
gs repo init

git add foo.txt
gs bc foo -m 'Add foo.txt'

gs bco main
git add bar.txt
git commit -m 'Add bar.txt'

gs bco foo
! gs branch fold
stderr 'branch foo needs to be restacked'

gs branch restack
gs branch fold

git log --oneline --decorate --graph --branches
cmp stdout $WORK/golden/graph.txt

-- repo/foo.txt --
foo

-- repo/bar.txt --
bar

-- golden/graph.txt --
* 8290e7d (HEAD -> main) Add foo.txt
* dbd2ca3 Add bar.txt
* 9bad92b Initial commit
